fixes.name: Change Face
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau subtraction of two calculated fields to DAX by mapping each field reference to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[FieldName] and preserving the arithmetic operation.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The referenced calculated fields ([FACE T], [FACE T-1]) depend on parameters in their definitions; parameter-based calculations must be measures, so this calculation must be a measure.
